channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Third Eye/The Mind Twister
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]The Third Eye[/color] >**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** >**Day Ability (Mental Challenge)** : Make a player accuse another one of treason. (2 Uses) > >**Night Ability (Mental Link)** : Select 2 players. Their whispers to each other will be hidden from The Court.(Infinite Uses - May Not Target Yourself) >**Night Ability (Unbalance in The Court)** : Hear The Cult/The Unseen members talk. (1 Use - Announce The Cult/The Unseen someone's listening to them)
> # [color=purple]The Mind Twister[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > >**Day Ability (Mind Control)** : Your vote will count as 2 votes.(3 Uses - You vote someone and make someone vote that person without telling the target who made them vote that person.The Person who you take control of will not see that they voted) > >**Night Ability (Clarity)** : Select 2 players. Their whispers to each other will be hidden from The Court BUT you can see their whispers.(Infinite Uses - May Not Target Yourself) >**Night Ability (Spy The Mind)** : Form a mental link with The Prince and their imprisoned person , hearing what they say in Jail.(2 Uses)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Third Eye/The Mind Twister
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Mental Challenge) : Make a player accuse another one of treason. (2 Uses)

Literally just noble.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Mental Link) : Select 2 players. Their whispers to each other will be hidden from The Court.(Infinite Uses - May Not Target Yourself)

Basically just private matters.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Unbalance in The Court) : Hear The Cult/The Unseen members talk. (1 Use - Announce The Cult/The Unseen someone’s listening to them)

Useless as they would never tell you anything useful. Really could just silence the nightchat for the same effect 9 times out of 10.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Third Eye/The Mind Twister

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Third Eye/The Mind Twister
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Third Eye

Blue Dragon Social
Day Ability (Mental Challenge) : Make a player accuse another one of treason. (2 Uses)

Night Ability (Mental Link) : Select 2 players. Their whispers to each other will be hidden from The Court.(Infinite Uses - May Not Target Yourself)
Night Ability (Unbalance in The Court) : Hear The Cult/The Unseen members talk. (1 Use - Announce The Cult/The Unseen someone’s listening to them)

The Mind Twister

Unseen Social

Day Ability (Mind Control) : Your vote will count as 2 votes.(3 Uses - You vote someone and make someone vote that person without telling the target who made them vote that person.The Person who you take control of will not see that they voted)

Night Ability (Clarity) : Select 2 players. Their whispers to each other will be hidden from The Court BUT you can see their whispers.(Infinite Uses - May Not Target Yourself)
Night Ability (Spy The Mind) : Form a mental link with The Prince and their imprisoned person , hearing what they say in Jail.(2 Uses)

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Third Eye/The Mind Twister
